data.name: Farm Fatale
data.detailed_description:
Go head to head in non stop chaotic games to be the last standing who isn't an animal and win!



Find chests to gather items with stacking passive abilities and use your weapons to transform your enemies and amass a herd of farm animals!

Farm Fatale takes a more casual and fun approach to the battle royale genre. With every game map being randomly generated, from terrain generation to structures and loot chests. So there's no need to worry about map knowlege or camping spots. When you are transformed you're never out, there are ways return to the game so you are never out completely!

This is a game in development, characters, equipment and items will be added as time goes on and we as developer and players work out what works well for the game.

data.short_description: Go head to head in high energy games to be the last standing who isn't an animal, and win!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
